name: The Fool
desc: New beginnings, optimism, trust in life

name: The Empress
desc: Abundance, nurturing, fertility, life in bloom!

name: The Hierophant
desc: Institutions, tradition, society and its rules

name: Strength
desc: Courage, subtle power, integration of animal self

name: Death
desc: The end of something, change, the impermeability of all things

name: The Devil
desc: Destructive patterns, addiction, giving away your power

name: The Tower
desc: Collapse of stable structures, release, sudden insight

name: The Sun
desc: Success, happiness, all will be well

name: Judgment
desc: Rebirth, a new phase, inner calling

name: The World
desc: Completion, wholeness, attainment, celebration of life

name: Queen of Swords
desc: Intelligent, writer, communicative yet cold - cuts through B.S.

name: Page of Swords
desc: mentally unstable or intellectually immature, acts without thinking

name: Ace of Swords
desc: A fresh start, a sudden opportunity or idea, clarity

name: 6 of Swords
desc: leaving, accepting help, going somewhere better

name: King of Cups
desc: Need to acknowledge deep feelings, avoid drowning out emotions

name: 4 of Cups
desc: boredom, dissatisfaction with what is being offered

name: 5 of Cups
desc: dwelling on the negative, self pity

name: 7 of Cups
desc: so many choices! Indecision, getting lost in fantasy

name: 8 of Cups
desc: abandoning something in search of something better

name: Queen of Wands
desc: Confidant, focused, has zest for life

name: Knight of Wands
desc: An adventurous risk taker who follows his passions

name: Page of Wands
desc: newly inspired, excited about life and work

name: Ace of Wands
desc: New beginnings, creative spark, fertile ideas

name: 3 of Wands
desc: Reaping the rewards of your efforts

name: 9 of Wands
desc: Pessimism, gearing up for the worst

name: 10 of Wands
desc: Feeling oppressed, exhaustion, too many responsibilities

name: King of Pentacles
desc: Enjoys the good life (food, drink and leisure), financially secure

name: Queen of Pentacles
desc: Healthy in body and finances, grounded and calm

name: Knight of Pentacles
desc: Cautious, sensible and slow to progress

name: Ace of Pentacles
desc: Financial reward, clarity of life purpose, goals

name: 3 of Pentacles
desc: Meaningful work, enjoying one’s work, suitable career

name: 4 of Pentacles
desc: Hoarding, feeling poor, holding self back out of fear

name: 5 of Pentacles
desc: Minor money troubles, health problems, feeling like an outsider

name: 7 of Pentacles
desc: Patience, waiting for your plans to bear fruit

name: 8 of Pentacles
desc: Hard work, focused efforts, laying the groundwork

name: 9 of Pentacles
desc: Luxury, rest, financial and material comforts
